website_summaries.verdict: A studded cowboy hat that will instantly bring a smile to your face.
pros: Felt hat with metal studs boasts a look and feel all its own
Designed for both adults and children
Offers a great hat for everyday use or as part of a cowboy or bull rider costume
More affordable than many comparable options
cons: Hat is one size fits all, but may be too large for children

customer_reviews.title: HUGE. Made for large heads
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made costume cowboy hat. It is sturdy and holds its shape. The material is hard but feels soft. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because of the size. It is huge and has no elastic band to help fit the head properly. Granted, I do have a small head (about 20 in circumference). This hat will only fit people who have larger sized heads - most likely adult males and even then, I'm not sure if it would stay in place. It will probably not fit a child.
customer_reviews.author: Usually Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and viewed many hats. I was buying this for my 14 year old son. It was hard to tell what would fit or would look like a real hat. This hat is great! The reviews were right. It has good shape and isn't floppy and best of all it fits him well! We get many compliments and is the perfect addition to his cowboy boots. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 4.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: This looked cute but it was far too big for my son who is almost 5. He was so disappointed. We went to an actual Cowboy store and found a hat that had a band inside that was super comfortable and allows him to wear the hat from a younger age to a larger age without having to make any adjustments. The one we received here was Very disappointing to have a received especially for what size/age it claims it fit. Size would fit more of a 6 year old is my guess without movement
customer_reviews.author: Josepha

customer_reviews.title: Very big hat... Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made for a "play" hat. Good price. BUT.... I should have paid more attention to the reviews. Some said it fit a small child. Others said adult. That's just not right......Can't fit both. IT'S HUGE! I have 6-8-10 year old grandsons and it falls off all three. I'm 68 and it's huge on me! The string tie may save it if I can keep it on one of my boys that way. I need it in 2 days so won't send back. Otherwise, I would. Again..... Should have paid attention.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good hat for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was a good buy. Very stiff material. We used it as a Halloween costume and then gave to a toddler to play with. The toddler has stood on it and it will go right back into its normal shape.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother 👎🏽👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. The interior is hard plastic and I’ve worn it once had to take it off because it’s so hard and uncomfortable. The outside is already showing stress marks. You get what you pay for. I am going to invest in a much better and more expensive hat. This is for kids wanting to play dress up
customer_reviews.author: Sanders Family

customer_reviews.title: Needed matching hats for a country themed wedding. Will work well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for our country themed wedding that both my young boys were in. A little big for my 2yr olds head but will work much better for my 5yr old. Can't really complain. They look cute and it wasn't overpriced. Also used them for a photo shoot. The strings kept getting in the way which is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cowboy hat!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was impressed for the money, a great cowboy/girl hat!. It looks amazing on my teen granddaughter, with her cowboys boots and Annie Oakley outfit! Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Berg

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy hat for all your cowboy lovers?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cowboy hat for my two year old for Christmas. He wants to be a cowboy and needed a new hat to go with his rocking horse. Great price value on hat and nice detail work around the head line. The strings on the hat are a nice bonus so you can tie hat around chin to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Workman

customer_reviews.title: Great for costume
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a costume and it worked well. Not super comfy so if you are looking for a high quality hat, keep looking. This is perfect for what it is though and at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Item not as describe or look like
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely disatified with this cowboy hat. The description and picture was very off of what the product really is. It should say child's very small the sides were curled up not flat and could not even tie it. It was totaly wrong in description .
customer_reviews.author: james woods

customer_reviews.title: Very large for a child
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for a child. Got this for my seven year old and it’s huge. There isn’t anything inside to keep the hat fitted so it moves around and falls off. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected for 4 year
customer_reviews.text: Percent hat for my four year old to Dress up for cowboy day. Can be worn for girl or boy too! It fit his head as expected
customer_reviews.author: A Nors

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a last minute option for my 6 yr old son for a Western themed dance. Fit his head really well. I wasn't a fan of the strings hanging down so I cut them off. He wouldn't tie it around his head anyways. It fit great and he really liked the hat!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, has that Texan country look. Everyone always asks where we got it for my son!
customer_reviews.author: sheira argote

customer_reviews.title: Kids Cowboy hat
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering a toddler size but it is adult size. My son still likes it but will have to grow into it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Lee

customer_reviews.title: False advertising on size
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. In the item description it says this hat is for 24 months and up, but the hat itself says 14 and up. As an adult it was way too big for my head! False advertising. I ordered this for my son who is turning a year and obviously it won't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: MaCayla Prevost

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy hat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hat for my 8 year old son... This hat is too hard so therefore pretty sturdy but too sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for costume..
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the price this product was ok. It felt very cheap but it was for Halloween so it was fine. Don’t see myself wearing it for anything else though...
customer_reviews.author: Sejal Shah

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way too big. This is basically just a cheap adult hat, not a child's hat. Bought it for Halloween but my personal hat fit my toddler better than this one. It was too big for me to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H

customer_reviews.title: Toy hat from Sheriff Woody
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to get a nice hat for outside when I work on my garden needing a new one but Was disappointed in the quality and it was more like a toy hat from Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Vicky ARMENDARIZ

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a great hat for my 3 year old. I didn't want to spend alot of money and him not play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Rider

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never reviewed any product in my life but this is so comically bad I had to. This is how the hat arrived out of the package. It is by far the cheapest looking thing I’ve ever ordered, ridiculous waste of money.... do yourself a solid and order something else
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaC

customer_reviews.title: Could use some more glue or something
customer_reviews.text: My son lives his cowboy hat but the ring around the cap on the outside is starting to come off like it was barely attached. He doesn't care but it just doesn't look astheticly pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This hat is so nice. It’s very well made and durable for our little cowboy. I’m sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Cute but big
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but a little big for my head and I have a big head. Got lots of compliments though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Costume-y
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was expecting, given the price. Definitely a costume hat, and not something that would be worn casually. Feels cheap and plasticy.
customer_reviews.author: Trey McGee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for their country western theme...The hat looked so good in person...nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice prop for a show
customer_reviews.text: I use the hat as a prop when I sing country songs at senior centers.

customer_reviews.title: For the money not bad
customer_reviews.text: You have to tie this hat under the kids chin they should have the push button clip that goes up and down by pushing the button

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my younger brother. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Real cowboy
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew just loves it. And has been wearing it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: nicole mcgahey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my product. Great quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: Little big
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. My 8 year old wore it for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopper Costume
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a Hopper from Stranger Things costume! Very sturdy-- I can throw it in the storage bin without having to worry about it losing shape.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel & Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Cowboy Hat For Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for the price! It’s exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, but not a good fit for child under 7...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year olds Halloween costume and it fits big. It has ties so you can tighten around the chin but still fairly large. Would not recommend for a child under 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely got better ones out there but the price is decent and ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely got better ones out there but the price is decent and the quality of the hat is not as bad as compared to other hats.
customer_reviews.author: Chow Yong Ching

customer_reviews.title: Runs big! But nicely constructed
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be for a child...no way!! This is too large for MY head nevermind a small boy. Aside from that it is very nicely made...maybe I'll be a cowboy for Halloween, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Nich

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a great hat so cannot day anything negative on it
customer_reviews.author: firas issa

customer_reviews.title: Good hat for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good hat for a good price, although it's a little smaller than I thought it would be. My head is medium to large (59 cm) and it's tight. Wouldn't fit if my head were any bigger. Got it to wear while playing Bang! and it has been a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. It’s clearly a toy hat but it looks great on. My daughter is dressing up like Annie Oakley for a report at school and this hat is perfect for her! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 5-year old
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Hard to find a play cowboy hat for my 5-year that fits well. The one that came with his cowboy costume was too big also.

customer_reviews.title: Cute hat! Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great cowboy hat with a rich brown color. Runs on the small side but is made with great durable material.

customer_reviews.title: but a good enough hat for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Not a fabulous hat, but a good enough hat for a kid, especially at the price I paid. My kiddo loves it!

customer_reviews.title: This cowboy hat looks nice but it is big
customer_reviews.text: This cowboy hat looks nice but it is big! My grandson has a lot of hair so hopefully it will fit.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the low price!
customer_reviews.text: Well made kids hat for the price! Little big on my 7 yo, but gives her rm to grow.

customer_reviews.text: Not great quality but just as described, inexpensive, would recommend for ironic/costume use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Cowboy Hat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for his Halloween costume. He loved it and it worked out perfectly!!

customer_reviews.title: Grandson’s face of delight when seeing the hat for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the hat for my grandson’s third birthday, he loves it. It has held up to a little boy who can be rough at times. I would recommend this to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a WOODY costume
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this all night and had no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great quality and so cute and would have been awesome ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great quality and so cute and would have been awesome with the string to tie but it is soooo large! I missed that somewhere bc I bought it for my toddler...

customer_reviews.title: Not for a child and material not good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a childs size and this hat fits my head and is too large for a four year old. The material is not what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelmia

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight which is perfect for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a cowboy hat for a dress up day at school. It is lightweight which is perfect for a 3 year old. The string kept it on his head (when he wanted it to)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for play.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Cowboy day at school and likes it a lot. He has been playing with it pretending to be a variety of characters and it has held up rather well for being so inexpensive. The only complaint I have is that the headband was loose when we got it and I had to glue it down.
customer_reviews.author: A Faithful Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a real (very expensive) cowboy hat!
customer_reviews.text: Using this hat as part of a cowboy costume, am amazed at how genuine it looks! Hat size is probably between 7-1/4 and 7-3/8. Because it's molded plastic, it doesn't conform well to head shape, but works very well for costume use.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids, not adults
customer_reviews.text: This hat was cute, but for being an adult size it wasn’t super comfortable, and didn’t fit my head the way I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Sue Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, genuine material
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this hat. Quality was better than what I had expected for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Harshul Pandav

customer_reviews.title: Well made, reasonably priced hat!
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced, well made cowboy hat for my grandson. I liked it so well that I bought another one for my second grandson.
customer_reviews.author: ciof6

customer_reviews.title: A bit to big, but very google quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 11 year old for Halloween. I don't know if her head was just abnormally small but it was really big. She still wore it for Halloween and it did work out in the end, just could of been better. However, the quality of this hat is really nice, I was expected it to be a little worse because of the cost but it was pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Basil J Ingemi

customer_reviews.title: One size doesn’t fit all.
customer_reviews.text: One size doesn’t fit all. Other than that love the hat. Sturdy material is great for my 4 yr old.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic! love it!
customer_reviews.text: i like the color. Affordable price,anyone can buy it. YEHEY!

customer_reviews.title: Size is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the fit since I struggle to find hats big enough, this one is perfect! It came in perfectly, the hat feels very sturdy almost like stiff felt. Perfect for a Halloween costume!!!

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this hat for any child
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made kids hat. It's well made and it fit my 6 year old very well. For the price, I would recommend this hat for any child. My son really likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit; bought both this hat a cowboy t-shirt ...

customer_reviews.title: A great little hat.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a western themed party. They were great!

customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my 14 year old for a costume. It arrived quickly and looked authentic.

customer_reviews.text: Looks good but not durable material as it looks like it is made up of cardboard.

customer_reviews.title: It's almost seems like it belongs to a costume
customer_reviews.text: It's not as thick as I thought it would be so I'm concerned about durability. It's almost seems like it belongs to a costume.

customer_reviews.title: my boys wanted cowboy hats and these were a great price for a play hat
customer_reviews.text: my boys wanted cowboy hats and these were a great price for a play hat, bought two the down fall is the band comes off easily so now neither of the hats have the decorative strip on top but they still play with them.

customer_reviews.text: The hat is definitely on the big side, but I was impressed with the quality for $10!!

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!

customer_reviews.text: I just like how it looks. But it’s the the worst item i have ever bought on Amazon. It’s a Cutbox.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cowboy hat. My son ordered it for his Halloween costume and it was a great addition.

customer_reviews.text: Not pleased at all. Bought it for a costume but it was stiff, uncomfortable and looked awful. Mistake to purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Good quality. A little larger than I thought for a 9 year old, but is good quality and the tie string helps.

customer_reviews.text: This hat is best used for a costume instead of regular use.

customer_reviews.title: Good costume hat
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap costume hat but sturdier than I imagined it would be. We used it for a Christmas in The West costume.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for the purpose and then some
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a Living Histroy Museum for my second grader. She was Annie Oakley. It looked great and has held up well in the dress up box since then. It is frequently used there by both my daughter and my son.
customer_reviews.author: Battyjac

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cute on my son. The quality is not the best. I would consider it more of a costume hat than a real cowboy hat.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat
customer_reviews.text: I love it it was part of my country party

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wants this hat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this hat and so do her friends. They all want to know where she got it from! I do wish it were a little thicker and sturdier, but for the reasonable price it's a fine choice.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect! My grandsons love them and wear them when they ride their stuck horses!

customer_reviews.title: It'll do for a Halloween costume

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This hat is not made of felt, rather it’s like a plastic base sprayed with fibers. Not super sturdy. The chin string is super short, and the hat band looks really cheap.

customer_reviews.text: Great little hat!! Perfect for a costume or dress up. Great to use for fun occasions or everyday! It was a little big but we expected it as we checked the measurements.

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great hat for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great hat for the price. It is really cute and fit my 11 year old son perfectly. (would fit an adult too.) He needed this for a costume and the hat was perfect. Well made.

customer_reviews.title: this is an adult size hat

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole on top!
customer_reviews.text: It came with a hole on the top fold. The string is low quality. The color is nice, but the overall quality is not good. The fabric is thin in many places and it looks like it would easily rip.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely LOVED it! It’s a weekly staple now. :)

customer_reviews.title: Great product at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Yeee haaah, bought these for myself and best friend as a novelty. These are good quality and design for the price I paid. If you expect a lot, expect to pay a lot.

product_meta.title: Kangaroo Cowboy Hat
feature_bullets: Durable Stylish Studded Black Cowboy Hat
Made of Felt with metal studs
Not just a Costume Hat but for Real Cowboys
